1.content:
"Hi, Chris McLean here! Your ideal host for all your Total Drama needs," he pronounced strolling through a studio. "Recently as you can understand! We've come under new management from the producers," he continued saying passing through different background sets from series. "Lucky for you we will still be here providing you with high-quality entertainment," Chris said happily raising his arms when a microphone falls on him in the shot. Chris gave the intern a stern look before returning to his usual self. "We have all your favorite girls from every Total Drama here waiting," he affirmed leaning closer to the camera, "And all the unlucky guys too!" he ended with laughing.

"But! That's not all," Chris proclaimed as he transitions into a science lab. "We here at Total Drama have had our best scientists manage to create an all-new experience," he said resting his arms around two scared looking people most likely extras in lab coats. "That's right! I present you with this," Chris announced pulling away from the sheet covering what's underneath. "Ta-Da! It's called...Hey, card!" he shouted to offset snapping his fingers. "Sorry! Here we go," he said opening the folded paper given to him, "It's called a The Fantastic Voyager-Maker..." Chris squinted his eyes trying to read the name of the invention. "You know what," he said ripping up the paper, "It's a Body Changer. Wow! That's a much easier title." he described. "Yes! Here at Total Drama, we've realized that perhaps some of you wish to be in the roles as the unfortunate victim," Chris stated as Chef rolled a male and female intern strapped down in strollers with sacks on their head.

"You heard me right! Now with a simple push of a button ." Chris said with a smile pressing the one right in front of him. The machine blew smoke and rumbled as the gears inside made a loud clacking before it fired on to the two people. "Walla!" Chris utters coughing waving the smoke away from his face. "These two here were generous enough to volunteer to be you." Chris laughed maniacally, "That's not all!" He pointed out, "They also have very flexible bodies that can do a lot, and I emphasize a lot of different things can happen.". The camera panned over to chief squishing the man into a ball and proceeded to dribble him round before shooting him in a basket. "Nice shot Chief!" Chris complimented his friend with a thumbs up. "So as you can it gonna be our craziest show yet," Chris said walking back to the island set. "I know many of you are sitting at home asking, "Chris what if I want that to happen to a previous consistent?". Well not to worry because I have issued in a new rule. Anyone person who wins one of the challenges can now choose between receiving immunity, or they can pick an opposing member and change them?" Chris laughed thinking of all the new ways things might happen.

"So it's might great pleasure for you to Welcome you back to Total Drama.."

Life was good enough, at least, that suddenly waking up in a room that was not his own at a fraction of his usual height was much more frightening than exciting.

A quick scan of his immediate surroundings told him he was standing on a raised surface somewhat above the carpeted floor, in a fairly gloomily decorated and not-exactly clean room. A range of possible actions flashed through Cody’s head, but all were put aside as the figure on the bed started to move, two pale arms emerging from the mass of blankets to stretch high into the air. 1521.content:
The phone alarm bell rang loudly. That's how the day always began when you to got up for the day before hitting the snooze button. You sat on the edge of your bed, placing your feet on the ground scratching your head through your long messy bed hair. You retain having the same nightmare again for two weeks in a row. It was where a strange TV Host zapped you with a machine, and you became a rubbery play-doh like person. You laughed it off as you proceed to the shower. Your name was Ashely a twenty-three years old who just finished community college. You have golden blonde hair and a beautiful tone body. After completing college, you decided to take on a recent part-time job as an assistant to a nearby daycare until you can pay off some debt. It was an ok job for the most part, but the kids can be a handful. There was one boy named Duncan always trying to escape. Another one was Courtney who was a bossy know it all teacher's pet. Finally, there was Gwen who was a weird mean little goth girl, along with a bunch of other toddlers coming and going.

Cleaning yourself up you got dressed in a casual purple uniform top button shirt with some jeans and sneakers. Heading out of your apartment you walked the busy streets you lived on before approaching the daycare. "Hi, mister Hatchet! Sorry, I'm late," you told him. Chef Hatchet was flustered causing you to become frightened by his facial expression. His shirt covered with different splats of paint. Izzy was chasing Harold around his feet, while Courtney was earing off to him from behind. "That's it! I'm going out to get myself a rainbow smooth. Ashley your in charge of the kids until I get back." Chef Hatchet said leaving in a hurry. You whimper with distress as Courtney began tugging at your shirt. "Ashley! Ashley! You might want to come and check on Duncan he's up to no good," she reported to you.

You followed her to a large dark closet. The light switch on the wall revealed that is was out as you played with it. Thankfully you found a flashlight close by turning it on to head deeper inside. "Ducan!" you yelled out the boy's name "Come on Ducan! You shouldn't be in here," you carried on saying as Courtney called out for him with you. Walking deep in you colled with a large unaware metal structure. "What the?" you said with surprise as the light from your flashlight revealed a machine. By closer inspection, it looked like the one that was precisely in your dream. Just then Ducan came jumping off the top of the device land right on the firing button before running out. Courtney cried out his name as she chased after him in a hurry. You screamed towards the kids who left you alone, given no chance but to scream yourself as a bright light shot towards you.

By the time you awoke on the floor your head was spinning. "What the heck?" you tried to remember what happened last. Shining the flashlight that was next to you the machine that had hit you with the strange light was gone. "Maybe I just hit my head and thought I saw it?" you reassured your sanity. Heading back out to the playroom it was in chaos. A few of the kids were bowing to Izzy who was wearing a crown of crayon on her head. Gwen was busy trying to steal Bridgette dolly from her. While Courtney was standing below Duncan who was yet again trying to escape. Your first reaction was to deal with Ducan who started your day off miserable. "Ducan you get down from there this instant!" you shouted at him hanging from the ceiling. "Ok if you say so," Duncan replied releasing his grip.

You grew scared for the small boy's safety. Holding out your arms to catch him you found yourself lacking the strength to support his weight crashing down on you. "Ahh!" you screech as the boy crashed down on you more and more flattening you into a butt print as he sat on top of you. Duncan had no knowledge of what had happened and stood up to run off. Your mind filled with terror, "What happened to me?" you thought as your nightmare had become real! You couldn't move any portion of your body. "Help! Someone! Chef Hatchet! KIDS!" you scream but no one could hear you speak. "Eww who left this molding clay here?" you heard a voice speaking about your current form. "Haha looks kind of funny with the eyes in it," it sounded feminine as they picked you up. You got a good look at the person face beings...
1521.title: Strange dreams coming true
